supportsClass

public boolean supportsClass(ModelElement melem)
Returns true if the classifier handles the given model element as on of its target classes.

supportsFeaturesOf

public boolean supportsFeaturesOf(ModelElement melem)
Returns true if the classifier wants to use features that belong to the given ModelElement. Typically this returns true whenever supportsClass() returns true, and also for specializations and generalizations of supported classes.

supportsFeatureInduction

public boolean supportsFeatureInduction()

skipAnnotation

public boolean skipAnnotation(SemAnnot sa,
                              ClassificationF clsF)
Returns:
true for all annotations that do not originate from IET and for all annotations of attributes not handled by this classifier.
